name: Gefen
overview:
Gefen Inc. supplies computer and electronics add-on solutions. The companyâ€™s solutions focus on integration, extension, distribution, and conversion technologies. It offers computer extension wizard, home theaters, computer audio/video integration, pro A/V, cables, accessories, apple accessories, and digital signage products. The companyâ€™s products are used in AV/IT and consumer electronics/home theater environments. Gefen offers its products through distributors in the United States, as well as through resellers in North America, Latin America, Europe, Asia, the Middle East and Africa, and Oceania.

The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Chatsworth, California. Gefen Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Linear LLC.
